pages.text: The $(item)Portable Purifier$() is a $(thing)Redstone Flux$() powered device that, when active, will purify $(water)Water$() contained within the unit and automatically hydrate the player as needed.$(br2)As opposed to the less advanced $(l:simple_tools/hydration_pack)Hydration Pack$(), the $(item)Portable Purifier$() does not require $(water)Purified Water$() and can instead be filled with normal $(water)Water$().
$(br)The $(item)Portable Purifier$() can either be equipped as a bauble or placed in the player's inventory and will remain fully functional.
